title: Ethereum Sidechain Ronin Adds Binance Pay to Wallet as 'Pixels' Game Surges
description: Pixels' move to Ronin has sparked a surge in blockchain activity in the past month. Now, Ronin's wallet is adding Binance Pay support.

title: Price analysis 12/1: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, SOL, ADA, DOGE, TON, LINK, AVAX
description:
Bitcoin price hit a new 2023 high on Dec.1 and multiple altcoins are following suit. Is the crypto market preparing for a Santa Claus rally?

Bitcoin (BTC) rallied about 9% in November, with $38,000 proving to be a difficult obstacle to cross. Coinglass data shows that in the past five years, Bitcoin rose only in 2020, but the extent of the rise at 46.92% was impressive.

Entering into the new year, several analysts are bullish on Bitcoin. 28 research note, Standard Chartered said that the possibility of the earlier-than-expected approval of spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds could boost the price of Bitcoin to $100,000 before end-2024.

Galaxy Digital CEO Mike Novogratz also sounded upbeat about Bitcoin while speaking to Bloomberg on Nov. Additionally, the Federal Reserve cutting rates may act as a further trigger that could send Bitcoin’s price near the all-time high by this time next year.

Could Bitcoin sustain above $38,000 and clear the path for a rally to $40,000, or will bears again play spoilsport?

Read more

title: Cardano's (ADA) Bullish Symphony: Investors Wonder, Can the Music Last?
description: Delve into the recent developments in the crypto market, focusing on the upward momentum of Cardano (ADA). Discover key support and resistance levels and explore potential scenarios for ADA's price movement. Whether ADA continues its upward journey or faces downward pressure, stay informed about the market dynamics

title: Blast L2 seeks senior blockchain builders after pulling $600m in deposits
description: The Ethereum layer-2 network launched by Blur’s co-founder and backed by Paradigm announced openings for two important roles for its promised mainnet which doesn’t exist yet.

title: Top 5 Altcoins That Could Ignite the Next Bull Market
description:
Crypto influencer Ben Armstrong revealed 5 altcoins that he believes could explode in the next bull run. In his latest YouTube video, the influencer named Render (RNDR), Theta Network (THETA), Pyth Network (PYTH), Conflux (CFX), and Radix (XRD) as the cryptocurrencies to watch in the next bull run.
